oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sweet Thursday [student-produced newsletter] January 1969
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Peace; Underground newspapers; Newsletters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The January 1969 edition of "Sweet Thursday," Christian Brothers College's underground student newspaper, addressed many of the publication's favorite themes: ending the war in Vietnam and pointing out the foibles of life on campus.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Michael J. Dean, Mike L. "Marty" Rice, Wayne Carrozza, James Coleman - staff members
